name: Explodia Roulette
description:
Explodia Roulette is a game where you shake your phones while trying not to make it "explode".

This is a local Multiplayer games, you need friends nearby to play this game.

This game was submitted to IGSI Game Jam 2020 #FunFromHome and won
-Best Game Art- Category.
More info: https://bit.ly/2Sa6yRW
